text: @realDonaldTrump Smarter #COVID19 testing, expanded tracing, and isolation strategies. Those are the priorities, that you continue to ignore. Also, refusing to allow our team of doctors, the ones based in science and reality, to be heard, is, imo, NEGLIGENCE. @SenateGOP @VP @HouseGOP
